metadata.title: CVE-2024-37015 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Ada Web Server 20.0. When configured to use SSL(which is not the default setting), the SSL/TLS used to establishconnections to external services is done without proper hostnamevalidation. This is exploitable by man-in-the-middle attackers.

criterions.comment: libaws package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
